title: Can't Log into Boards!
body: Some times when I try to log in (about 40%) it comes up with a message telling me to first create a summoner, anyone else get this annoying message?

replies.body:
Top left, make sure it says Oceania and not a different server.

That's my one ticket to helping you, from now on you'll be trolled with sarcastic replies.

>That's my one ticket to helping you, from now on you'll be trolled with sarcastic replies.


Probably

But its always set to OCE in the top corner, it will eventually work after a while though, so that's not the problem. Thanks for trying though, this was more just to let riot know it does that (if they even look at it).

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=YY3OPonG,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-03-16T04:33:52.172+0000)
>
> Probably
> 
> But its always set to OCE in the top corner, it will eventually work after a while though, so that's not the problem. Thanks for trying though, this was more just to let riot know it does that (if they even look at it).

Yes clearly, it's Riots fault and not yours as it works fine for everyone else, sometimes I wonder what goes through peoples heads.
I wasn't saying anything against riot, I was just stating it **might** be a problem with the boards, ill grab a screenshot for you next time it happens
If they do they're not replying because they can't log in...
